data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jesovnik, Ana, Schultz, Ted R. (2017): Revision of the fungus-farming ant genus Sericomyrmex Mayr (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Myrmicinae). ZooKeys 670: 1-109, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.670.11839, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.670.11839
